mapper.select: select * from KrSchedule where JOBPID = #{jobpId} AND SCHSTARTTIME > TO_DATE(${y}${m}01,'YYYYMMDD') AND SCHENDTIME < TO_DATE(${ty}${tm}01,'YYYYMMDD')
select * from (select * from KrSchedule where JOBPID = #{jobpId} AND SCHENDTIME < #{schstartTime} order by SCHSTARTTIME desc) where rownum=1
select * from (select * from KrSchedule where JOBPID = #{jobpId} AND SCHSTARTTIME > #{schendTime} order by SCHSTARTTIME asc) where rownum=1
select schid from krschedule where jobpid = #{jobpId} And schstarttime = #{schstartTime}
select * from krschedule where jobpid=#{jobpId} And schstarttime >= #{schstartTime} And SCHENDTIME <= #{schendTime}
select t.JOBPID from KRTeammember m, KRTeam t where m.TEAMID = t.TEAMID AND m.JBSKID = #{jbskId}
